https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l53X0ar16mInf7TaT2HVAu052al.jpg A funeral director meets a man who has been battling Lou Gehrig's disease since he was young. The two fall in love and hope for a cure that can keep him alive. Closer to Heaven
